Fantasy Fashion - Minotaur Legs and Hooves
Style “Fantasy” – Jambes et sabots de minotaure
Fantasie-Mode - Minotaur-Hose und -Hufe
Moda Fantasia: gambe e zoccoli da Minotauro
Moda "Fantasía" - Piernas y pezuñas de Minotauro
Fantasy Fashion - Minotaur Legs and Hooves
판타지 패션 - 미노타우로스의 다리와 발굽 (남성)
Fantasy Fashion - Minotaur Legs and Hooves (Men)
幻想風格服裝-牛頭怪之腿和蹄(男用)
幻想風格服裝-牛頭怪之腿和蹄(男用)
Fantasy Fashion - Minotaur Legs and Hooves
kDesc
Fuelled by rage, you are the Minotaur. May your enemies cower with fear. [#Legal]
Vous incarnez la colère, vous êtes le minotaure. Que vos ennemis tremblent de peur ! [#Legal]
Erfüllt von Zorn bist du ein Minotaur. Mögen deine Feinde vor Furcht niederkauern. [#Legal]
Sei il Minotauro, la tua stessa ira è il tuo carburante. Che possano i tuoi nemici tremare per la paura. [#Legal]
Cargado de rabia, eres el Minotauro. ¡Ya pueden tus enemigos temblar de miedo! [#Legal]
Fuelled by rage, you are the Minotaur. May your enemies cower with fear. [#Legal]
가득찬 분노. 당신은 미노타우로스입니다. 적들은 공포로 움츠러들겁니다. [#Legal]
Fuelled by rage, you are the Minotaur. May your enemies cower with fear. [#Legal]
燃燒的怒火，你是牛頭怪。 願你的敵人都懼怕退縮。 [#Legal]
燃燒的怒火，你是牛頭怪。 願你的敵人都懼怕退縮。 [#Legal]
Fuelled by rage, you are the Minotaur. May your enemies cower with fear. [#Legal]
